title: Apiculturist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, Swarm a player, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and control immune.
- If a player you Swarmed the previous night is hanged, you will gather blood from their body. From now on, when you Swarm a player, reduce their defense to Vulnerable for the night.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4709
*The stinging isn't the worst part anymore.*
